author: Benjamin Villaraza
title: Israel: Israeli police recommend bribery charges against Netanyahu
text:
February 14th, 2018 Middle East 
Israeli police on Tuesday recommended indicting Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu for bribery, opening the way for what could be the biggest challenge yet to the right-wing leader’s political survival. 
Against the backdrop of Israeli flags in a televised speech at his residence, a somber Netanyahu called the allegations baseless and vowed to complete his fourth term in office. 
It will be up to Israel’s attorney general to decide whether to file charges, a process that could take weeks if not months.
